thread.title: Luke

author: Luke
title: Luke
text:
I had been putting off getting a service for a while as I have been extremely busy, so I planned on getting a service done at the same time as MOT. I was concerned that I would loose a day due to dropping the car off and picking it up again, so I was delighted to see an advert for ServiceStop when searching for a good price for MOT and Service combined.
ServiceStop were great, picked the car up from my house, completed the work and got the car back around 14:00 the same day, this allowed me to continue working uninterrupted which was most appreciated.
